name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Skilled Game Tester with expertise in mobile game testing on both iOS and Android platforms. Proficient in test case management systems like **TestRail**, **Zephyr**, and **Jira**, with strong experience in functional testing, regression testing, cross-platform testing, and usability testing. Proven ability to contribute to cross-functional teams, streamline processes, and enhance software performance while delivering high-quality game products.
